verses.verse: We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears,<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H6467>us,<s%> what work you <S%H6466>did<s%> in their <S%H3117>days,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>

You drove <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> with your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but you <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H7489>them.<s%> You afflicted the <S%H3816>peoples,<s%> but you spread them <S%H7971>abroad.<s%>

For they <S%H3423>didn't<s%> get the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H3423>possession<s%> by their own <S%H2719>sword,<s%> neither did their own <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3225>them;<s%> but your right hand, and your <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and the <S%H216>light<s%> of your <S%H6440>face,<s%> because you were favorable to <S%H7521>them.<s%>
You are my <S%H4428>King,<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H6680>Command<s%> <S%H3444>victories<s%> for <S%H3290>Jacob!<s%>
Through <S%H5055>you,<s%> will we push down our <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%> Through your <S%H8034>name,<s%> will we tread them <S%H947>under<s%> who rise up against <S%H6965>us.<s%>
For I will not <S%H982>trust<s%> in my <S%H7198>bow,<s%> neither shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> save <S%H3467>me.<s%>
But you have <S%H3467>saved<s%> us from our <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and have <S%H954>shamed<s%> those who hate <S%H8130>us.<s%>
In <S%H430>God<s%> we have made our <S%H1984>boast<s%> all <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3034>long,<s%> we will give thanks to your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H637>But<s%> now you <S%H2186>rejected<s%> <S%H3637>us,<s%> and brought us to dishonor, and <S%H3318>don't<s%> go out with our <S%H6635>armies.<s%>
You make us <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> from the <S%H6862>adversary.<s%> Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> us take spoil for <S%H8154>themselves.<s%>
You have <S%H5414>made<s%> us like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> and have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> us among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
You <S%H4376>sell<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H1952>nothing,<s%> and have gained <S%H1952>nothing<s%> from their <S%H4242>sale.<s%>
You <S%H7760>make<s%> us a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> a <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> and a <S%H7047>derision<s%> to those who are around <S%H5439>us.<s%>
You <S%H7760>make<s%> us a <S%H4912>byword<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> a <S%H4493>shaking<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> among the <S%H3816>peoples.<s%>
<S%H3117>All<s%> day long my <S%H1322>dishonor<s%> is before <S%H1322>me,<s%> and shame <S%H3680>covers<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%>
At the <S%H6963>taunt<s%> of one who <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> and verbally <S%H1442>abuses,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and the <S%H5358>avenger.<s%>
All this has <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H7911>us,<s%> yet have we not forgotten <S%H8266>you,<s%> Neither have we been false to your <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
Our <S%H3820>heart<s%> has not <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> neither have our <S%H838>steps<s%> <S%H5186>strayed<s%> from your <S%H734>path,<s%>
Though you have <S%H1794>crushed<s%> us in the <S%H4725>haunt<s%> of <S%H8577>jackals,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> us with the shadow of <S%H6757>death.<s%>
If we have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> or spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> our <S%H3709>hands<s%> to a <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>god;<s%>
<S%H430>won't<s%> God search this <S%H2713>out?<s%> For he <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H2026>Yes,<s%> for your sake we are killed all <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2803>long.<s%> We are regarded as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter.<s%>
<S%H5782>Wake<s%> <S%H3462>up!<s%> Why do you sleep, <S%H136>Lord?<s%> <S%H6974>Arise!<s%> <S%H2186>Don't<s%> reject us <S%H5331>forever.<s%>
Why do you <S%H5641>hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> our <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and our <S%H3906>oppression?<s%>
For our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is bowed <S%H7743>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%> Our <S%H990>body<s%> <S%H1692>clings<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H6965>Rise<s%> up to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H6299>us.<s%> Redeem us for your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%>' sake.
